defaultLanguageMapping.description: Map that associates to a locale, the other locale / language that should be used as default values

useMetadataAsDefault.description: Should missing translations for a given language be filled from the default values from the metadata or not

ignoreReferencesIfNotDefault.description: Do not resolve references when the value of the child key has been customized (eg. is neither undefined or the default value)

assets.description: Asset folder containing the package translations

checkUnusedTranslation.description: Check if a translation from the asset folder is not a registered translation

failIfMissingMetadata.description: Throws an error if there is missing metadata
